subject: VAM Pro Linear Motor
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Team,

I recently purchased the *VAM Pro Linear Motor* and would like to use it
with my *Simsonn Pro Pedals*, which I previously bought through *Amazon*.

Unfortunately, since the purchase was made via Amazon, I do not have a
direct Simsonn order number. However, the Amazon product code (ASIN) is:
*B0D7MMSK14*
The pedals were ordered around: 02.12.2024

Could you please help me confirm whether I need a *Plus X Control Box* or
any additional components to use the VAM Pro with my current pedals?

I want to make sure everything is compatible before proceeding.

Thank you in advance for your support!

Best regards,

Witold Yasempa

conversations.body_text: Hi Witek Zasempa,    You will need the PlusX control box to use the vibration motor, as the default Pro Plus controller does not have a motor interface.  Also, could you confirm whether the VAM Pro you purchased includes a dedicated power supply?  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498

Hi,

Thank you for your reply.

Yes, I have already ordered the *PlusX Control Box*, and I can confirm that
my order of the *VAM Pro Linear Motor* also includes the *power supply*.

My order number is: *#SSN2024*

Looking forward to setting everything up — thanks again for your support!

Best regards,
*Witek Zasempa*

pt., 18 lip 2025 o 01:14 service@simsonn.com

Hi Witek Zasempa,  That should be no problem. Once you receive the control box, please perform an Offset factory calibration for the pedals. Since the control box was purchased separately, it doesn’t come with pre-configured calibration values, so a manual calibration is required. Please use the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9 for this process. It also supports SIMHUB version 9.9.3.       https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

That's great, thank you very much.
